trans-unit.source: Represents a control that can be used to present a collection of objects on a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle que pode ser usado para apresentar uma coleção de objetos em uma superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter> is the second key [!INCLUDE[avalon1](~/includes/avalon1-md.md)] control provided by the [!INCLUDE[wf2](~/includes/wf2-md.md)] designer infrastructure that is collection based.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter> é a segunda chave [!INCLUDE[avalon1](~/includes/avalon1-md.md)] controle fornecido pelo [!INCLUDE[wf2](~/includes/wf2-md.md)] designer infra-estrutura de coleção com base.

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter> enables the display and the editing of a single contained element, the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter> is collection based, displays a visualization, and supports editing of the collection of items provided by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter> permite a exibição e a edição de um único elemento contido, o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter> é coleção com base, exibe uma visualização e dá suporte à edição da coleção de itens fornecidos pelo <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.Items%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: In addition to allowing the multiple items contained in the collection to be visualized and edited, the `WorkflowItemsPresenter` also enables collection-oriented actions, such as inserting an item at a given index in the collection, deleting an item from the collection, and moving an item from one index to another.
trans-unit.target: Além de permitir que os vários itens contidos na coleção a ser visualizado e editado, a `WorkflowItemsPresenter` também permite orientada a coleção de ações, como inserir um item de um determinado índice na coleção, a exclusão de um item da coleção e mover um item de um índice para outra.

trans-unit.source: `WorkflowItemsPresenter` also handles combined actions, such as dragging between the various presenters and allowing that edit to occur in a single, undoable action.Use <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter> to present a single object on a design surface.
trans-unit.target: `WorkflowItemsPresenter` também identificadores combinados ações, como arrastar entre os vários apresentadores e permitindo que essa edição ocorrer em uma ação única e não pode ser desfeita. Use <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter> para apresentar um único objeto em uma superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: For an example of the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter> in use, see the [Custom Composite Designers - Workflow Items Presenter](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-designers-workflow-items-presenter.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter> em uso, consulte o [Designer de compostos personalizados - apresentador de itens de fluxo de trabalho](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-designers-workflow-items-presenter.md) exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The following sample code shows how you can build a designer for the Parallel activity.
trans-unit.target: O código de exemplo a seguir mostra como você pode criar um designer para a atividade paralela.

trans-unit.source: Note the binding to ModelItem.Branches for the Items.
trans-unit.target: Observe a associação para ModelItem.Branches para os itens.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of item supported by the presenter.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de item compatível com o apresentador.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Type" /> of item supported by the presenter.
trans-unit.target: O <see langword="Type" /> do item tem suportada pelo apresentador.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.AllowedItemType" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.AllowedItemType" />.

trans-unit.source: The list of objects to be pasted.
trans-unit.target: A lista de objetos a serem colados.

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean that indicates whether the specified objects can be pasted.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um booliano que indica se os objetos especificados podem ser colados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified list of objects can be pasted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a lista especificada de objetos puder ser colada; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object for resolving types used by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto para resolver os tipos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypeResolvingOptions" /> object for resolving types used by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypeResolvingOptions" /> objeto para resolver os tipos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter.DroppingTypeResolvingOptions" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter.DroppingTypeResolvingOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="DataTemplate" /> that defines how the footer section of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see langword="DataTemplate" /> que define como a seção de rodapé do controle <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> é exibida.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="DataTemplate" /> that defines how the footer section of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="DataTemplate" /> que define como a seção de rodapé do controle <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> é exibida.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.FooterTemplate" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.FooterTemplate" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="DataTemplate" /> that defines how the header section of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see langword="DataTemplate" /> que define como a seção de cabeçalho do controle <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> é exibida.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="DataTemplate" /> that defines how the header section of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="DataTemplate" /> que define como a seção de cabeçalho do controle <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> é exibida.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.HeaderTemplate" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.HeaderTemplate" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that contains the hint text for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cadeia de caracteres que contém o texto de dica para o controle <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" />.

trans-unit.source: The hint text for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O texto de dica para o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> controle.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.HintText" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.HintText" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the index dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência de índice.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the current designer is the default container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor booliano que indica se o designer atual é o contêiner padrão.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current designer is the default container; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o designer atual é o contêiner padrão; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.IsDefaultContainer" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.IsDefaultContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection used to generate the content of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coleção usada para gerar o conteúdo do <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="ModelItemCollection" /> used to generate the content of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="ModelItemCollection" /> usado para gerar o conteúdo a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that defines the panel that controls the layout of items.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modelo que define o painel que controla o layout dos itens.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="ItemsPanelTemplate" /> that defines the panel to use for the layout of the items.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="ItemsPanelTemplate" /> que define o painel a ser usado para o layout dos itens.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.ItemsPanel" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.ItemsPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: By providing a custom panel template, you can customize and control the layout of the contained items.
trans-unit.target: Ao fornecer um modelo do painel personalizado, você pode personalizar e controlar o layout dos itens contidos.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.ItemsPanel%2A> is based on a vertically oriented `StackPanel`.
trans-unit.target: O padrão <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.ItemsPanel%2A> baseia-se na orientação vertical `StackPanel`.

trans-unit.source: As an illustration, the `ItemsPanel` for the designer of <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel> activities is based on a horizontally oriented `StackPanel`.
trans-unit.target: Como ilustração, o `ItemsPanel` para o designer de <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel> atividades baseia-se em uma orientação horizontal `StackPanel`.

trans-unit.source: The following example in XAML shows the `ItemsPanel` for the designer of <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel> activities that is based on a horizontally oriented `StackPanel`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir no XAML mostra os `ItemsPanel` para o designer de <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel> atividades com base na orientação horizontal `StackPanel`.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.Items" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.Items" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" />-specific <see langword="AutomationPeer" /> implementation for the [!INCLUDE[avalon1](~/includes/avalon1-md.md)] infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma implementação <see langword="AutomationPeer" /> específica ao <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> para a infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[avalon1](~/includes/avalon1-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Implement this method in your derived class to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: Implemente esse método em sua classe derivada para adicionar tratamento de classe para esse evento.

trans-unit.source: The type-specific <see langword="AutomationPeer" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: A implementação de <see langword="AutomationPeer" /> específica ao tipo.

trans-unit.source: Provides data for the drag event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged into the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um objeto é arrastado para os limites do controle.

trans-unit.source: Provides data for the drag event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged over the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um objeto é arrastado sobre os limites do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="DragEventArgs" /> instance that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A instância <see langword="DragEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an object is dragged into the bounds of a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Invocado quando um objeto é arrastado para os limites de um controle <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" />.

trans-unit.source: Implement this method in your derived class to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: Implemente esse método em sua classe derivada para adicionar tratamento de classe para esse evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="EventArgs" /> instance that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A instância <see langword="EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Invoked when a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> object is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Invocado quando um objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> é inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Implement this method in your derived class to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: Implemente esse método em sua classe derivada para adicionar tratamento de classe para esse evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> that was moved.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> que foi movido.

trans-unit.source: Informs the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> that a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> was moved.
trans-unit.target: Informa o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> de que um <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> foi movido.

trans-unit.source: If `modelItem` is in <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.Items%2A>, it is removed.
trans-unit.target: Se `modelItem` está em <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.Items%2A>, ele será removido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> instances to be copied.
trans-unit.target: As instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> a serem copiadas.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> instances are cloned.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando as instâncias <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> especificadas são clonadas.

trans-unit.source: The copied items.
trans-unit.target: Os itens copiados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> instances to be cut.
trans-unit.target: As instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> a serem recortadas.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> instances are cut.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando as instâncias <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> especificadas são cortadas.

trans-unit.source: A clone of <paramref name="itemsToCut" />.
trans-unit.target: Clone de <paramref name="itemsToCut" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> instances to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: As instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> a serem excluídas.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> instances are deleted.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando as instâncias <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> especificadas são excluídas.

trans-unit.source: The items that has been moved.
trans-unit.target: Os itens que foram movidos.

trans-unit.source: Invoked after the start of a move operation to complete the moving of the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Invocado após o início de uma operação de movimentação para concluir a movimentação do item especificado.

trans-unit.source: The items to be pasted.
trans-unit.target: Os itens a serem colados.

trans-unit.source: The metadata associated with the items to be pasted.
trans-unit.target: Os metadados associados aos itens a serem colados.

trans-unit.source: The location of the paste.
trans-unit.target: O local da colagem.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the paste point.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência ao ponto de colar.

trans-unit.source: Pastes the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> instances to the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Cola as instâncias <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> especificadas no local especificado.

trans-unit.source: The selected items to be sorted.
trans-unit.target: Os itens selecionados a serem classificados.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the selected items.
trans-unit.target: Classifica os itens selecionados.

trans-unit.source: The list of the sorted items.
trans-unit.target: A lista dos itens classificados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="DataTemplate" /> that defines how the spacer of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see langword="DataTemplate" /> que define como o espaçador do controle <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> é exibido.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="DataTemplate" /> that defines how the spacer of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="DataTemplate" /> que define como o espaçador do <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> controle é exibido.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.SpacerTemplate" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.SpacerTemplate" />.
